addon.description: Bottle is a fast and simple micro-framework for small web applications. It offers request dispatching (Routes) with url parameter support, templates, a built-in HTTP Server and adapters for many third party WSGI/HTTP-server and template engines - all in a single file and with no dependencies other than the Python Standard Library.
addon.name: Bottle
addon.summary: Fast and simple WSGI-framework for small web-applications
